title: Marek Ondrík
text: Marek Ondrík (born 30 November 1990 in <a href="Ru%C5%BEomberok">Ružomberok</a>) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender who currently plays for <a href="FK%20Inter%20Bratislava">FK Inter Bratislava</a>, on loan from <a href="MFK%20Ru%C5%BEomberok">MFK Ružomberok</a>.
